title: Top Five Hitchcock Movies and ‘Psycho’ at 60
description:
The Master of Suspense's classic film ‘Psycho’ turns 60 this month, so Sean and Amanda have convened Chris Ryan and The New York Times' Wesley Morris for a deep conversation about the filmmaker's career and best work. They pick their top fives and discuss at length what makes Hitchcock's work resonate to this day.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guests: Chris Ryan and Wesley Morris
